home.home_desc: Small proyect to share my recipes

about.p1: Hi, I'm Jonatan and this is my little recipe page project.
about.p2: Small project to learn and practice react and tailwind, the web design is based on the web bingingwithbabish.com

recipes_page.title: Recipes
recipes_page.desc: Here you can find all my recipes
recipes_page.placeholdertext: You can search by recipe name or ingredient

chanamasala.name: Chana masala
chanamasala.title: Chana masala
chanamasala.summary: Chana masala, not very traditional but quick and easy, I also like to accompany it with black beans
chanamasala.cardtitle: Chana masala, not very traditional but quick

chanamasala_curry_steap.name: The curry
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_1: Cut the onion into julianas, chop the garlic and ginger
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_2: Sauté the onion in a pan with oil until it is slightly transparent
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_3: Add the garlic, ginger, spices and butter to the pan and cook for 5min
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_4: Add the concentrated tomato and fry for 3 minutes
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_5: Add the chickpeas and  beans with their included liquid and the coconut milk
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_6: Leave it to simmer for about 10 minutes and when finished try salt and add lemon and cilantro
chanamasala_curry_steap.chanamasala_curry_steap_7: Serve with some basmati rice or bread

carababurrata.name: Sweet Potato with Roasted Grapes, Rosemary, Walnuts and Burrata
carababurrata.title: Sweet Potato with Roasted Grapes, Rosemary, Walnuts and Burrata
carababurrata.summary: Sweet potato accompanied by some grapes with a glaze of white wine and balsamic vinegar, burrata and walnuts
carababurrata.cardtitle: Sweet Potato with Roasted Grapes, Rosemary, Walnuts and Burrata

carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap.name: Roasted sweet potato
carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap.carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap_2: Wash, cut in half and mark the sweet potatoes
carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap.carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap_3: In a hot pan add 1 tablespoon of butter and cook upside down until the sweet potato is browned.
carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap.carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap_4: Add rosemary, garlic and salt and pepper to taste
carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap.carababurrata_sweetpotatos_steap_5: Add the rest of the butter and put it in the oven for 20 minutes until tender.

carababurrata_grapes_steap.name: Grapes
carababurrata_grapes_steap.carababurrata_grapes_steap_1: Add 1 tablespoon of butter to a very hot skillet.
carababurrata_grapes_steap.carababurrata_grapes_steap_2: When the butter is brown, add the washed grapes and roast until the skin is slightly charred.
carababurrata_grapes_steap.carababurrata_grapes_steap_3: Add the rosemary wine and vinegar and the rest of the butter until a glaze forms.

carababurrata_garnish_steap.name: Garnish
carababurrata_garnish_steap.carababurrata_garnish_steap_1: Add the potatoes to a plate, accompany the top with the grapes and the glaze and finally add the walnuts and the burrata

currycacahuete.name: Peanut butter and honey curry
currycacahuete.title: Peanut butter and honey curry
currycacahuete.summary: Curry similar to other curries such as chana masala but with a sweeter touch thanks to honey and peanut butter

currycacahuete_curry_steap.name: The curry
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_1: Cut and sauté the peppers and the aubergine, once poached put aside
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_2: Cut the onion into julienne strips, chop the garlic and ginger
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_3: Sauté the onion in a pan with oil until it is slightly transparent
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_4: Add the garlic, ginger, spices and butter to the pan for 5min.
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_5: Add the concentrated tomato and fry for 3 minutes
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_6: Add the vegetables that were set aside and the coconut milk.
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_7: Add the peanut butter and honey and mix
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_8: Leave it to simmer for about 10 minutes and when finished try salt and add lemon and cilantro
currycacahuete_curry_steap.currycacahuete_curry_steap_9: Serve with some basmati rice or naan bread
